parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From ek and homologeo; to acknowledge or agree fully.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; the Jordanes, a river of Palestine.
A river, torrent, stream. Probably from a derivative of the alternate of pino; a current, brook or freshet, i.e. Running water.
